about_the_game:
The Tribes of Midgard Original Soundtrack is a 26-song album of mythical scale brought to you by the skalds at Vibe Avenue.

Encapsulating the sweeping melodies of Tribes of Midgard’s adventure, this OST captures the epic highs, the harrowing lows, and everything in between, as players settle and fight their way across Midgard and beyond on a quest to stop Ragnarök.

From the rousing horns of ‘Valhöll’, to the soothing woodwinds of ‘Heim’, to the pulse-pounding drums of ‘Jötunn’, the Tribes of Midgard OST is sure to take you on a musical saga of your very own!
